textBox.richText: Came up this weekend with Mom and Max. Checked the reports first thing in the morning...although WP announced Jane is opening on next tuesday, the Zephyr still isn’t running (just Sale and all the Discovery Park stuff). Loveland has some of the blues off of Chair 2 (Firecut & Drifter) and Chair 6 (Keno, Blackjack), but Copper has some of the stuff under Timberline *and* some of the blacks under Excellerator. I convinced them to do the drive. :) [and yes, the drive was a little evil. almost 2 hrs, bad traffic, slippery conditions. but it was worth it] Mom went over to timberline early...Max and I hit the blacks. REAL MOGULS!!! Yay!!! Had a blast...vid and stats below.
